item.title: Animation for loopable animal sleep cartoon sleep music videos - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone who can do 100% EXACT type of animation as this video (I will provide the image):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oeewB5ULF-A

to be more detailed in the request:

Note there's both Passive movement vs Occasional Intentional Active Movement:

Passive movement would be like the body and figure kinda just swaying generally. As if it were breathing or wind is blowing slightly at it. General particles falling in background like snow

Active movement would be like every 6-10 seconds, there would be a more intentional nose wiggling, one ear twitching, eyes blinking, paw twitching, etc. These movements occasionally really brings the animal to life i think.

A great example would be this video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IFLULc_JT2Q&ab_channel=DreamsAdrift

our rate is 10$ per image

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 19, 2024 14:10 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:2D Animation, Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Skills: 2D Animation, Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Country: Ukraine
click to apply

item.description:
Take a tutorial video raw files (one for my face and the other for my screen) and edit them to create a tutorial video I could publish in Youtube. There is 30 minutes of material, but there are big chunks that can be cut off because I messed up and started over a bunch of times.

Use your own style of editing to make the video easy to follow for the viewers.

item.description:
We are seeking a talented content creator to produce 1 or 2 video reels per month. The ideal candidate should be comfortable speaking in front of the camera and have experience in video and photo montage editing. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, and editing engaging videos that align with our brand image. This role requires strong storytelling skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently. If you have a creative mindset, a passion for creating compelling video content, and proficiency in video editing software, we would love to hear from you.

- Video editing

item.title: Remote Video Content Creator For Marketing Agency | 20 hours/week - Upwork
item.description:
Remote Video Content Creator for Marketing Agency - 25 hrs/week

Are you a self-starter video editor brimming with creative ideas and a knack for trending TikTok, YouTube and Instagram content? Do you love seeing your Meta video ads turn into viral sales machines? We're a dynamic digital marketing agency in Ontario, Canada specializing in e-commerce brands and service businesses, seeking a part-time Video Content Creator to join our remote team for 20 hours a week.

Key Responsibilities:

- Craft engaging video content that resonates with our audience and aligns with current TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube trends.
- Create video content for Facebook and Instagram paid ads.
- Adhere to and evolve our brand’s visual and messaging guidelines to maintain a consistent brand identity across all video content.
- Bring fresh, innovative content ideas to the table that will captivate and expand our digital presence.
- Coordinate with other content creators to produce cohesive and compelling digital narratives.

Requirements:

- Proven experience creating viral TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube content and a strong understanding of platform-specific best practices.
- Proven experience creating Facebook and Instagram video ads.
- Mastery of video editing apps like Capcut, Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe After Effects. Knowledge of Figma and other graphic design apps is a plus.
- A portfolio that showcases your flair for video storytelling and content creation.
- Excellent time management skills and the ability to work autonomously.
- Proficiency in video adjustments such as temperature, hue, saturation, brightness, contrast, and sharpness.
- Experience in audio mixing and ensuring a balanced audio output.
- Familiar with using masks for selective editing, basic compositing, and cutouts.
- Knowledgeable in incorporating brand elements consistently, including colors, fonts, and styles.
- Strong understanding of the latest video editing tools and techniques, and staying current with updates in preferred software.
- A proactive mindset with the ability to initiate projects and ideas without constant oversight.
- Basic knowledge of digital marketing practices and social media management tools.
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively.
- Ability to handle multiple projects under tight deadlines.
- Familiarity with tools such as Slack and ClickUp for team communication and project management.
- Attention to detail. With that note, please start your Cover Letter with your favorite animal.

What We Offer:

- Flexible and remote work opportunities.
- A vibrant learning environment with ample opportunities for professional growth.
- A supportive work culture.

*This is a remote role for a contractor position within a Canadian Digital Marketing Agency. Work submissions and team collaborations are done within the hours of 10-2 EST (Toronto Time).

If you're ready to roll up your sleeves and dive into the world of digital content creation, we'd love to hear from you. Please submit a cover letter outlining your experience and why you know you will be a great fit for this role.

Sandra

Hourly Range: $10.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 13:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram, Video Editing, Video Animation, TikTok Video, Ad Creative
Skills: Instagram, Video Editing, Video Animation, TikTok Video, Ad Creative
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Expert Video Planner & Editor for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are an innovative and rapidly growing YouTube channel dedicated to showcasing Chinese culture. We are looking for a talented Video Planner & Editor to join our team and contribute to the creative process from planning through to final production.

Responsibilities
- Plan and develop video content ideas and storyboards.
- Edit and assemble raw material into a finished product suitable for publishing.
- Review shooting scripts and raw material to create a shot decision list based on scenes’ value and contribution to continuity.
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film.
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects.
- Create rough and final cuts.
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running.
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry best practices to maximize efficiency.
- Collaborate with the creative team to develop new content ideas.

Requirements
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor and/or Video Planner, preferably with experience in YouTube content.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects, Filmora or similar tools.
-- Strong portfolio demonstrating video planning and editing skills and storytelling ability.
- Ability to understand the desired outcome of a project and bring it to life.
- Creative mind and storytelling skills.
- Attention to detail and ability to work methodically.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work within a team.
- Knowledge of YouTube's platform, algorithms, and best practices for video optimization is a plus.
- Fast turnaround time, for video less than 10 mins, preferably within 2 days.

The budget is for per video.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 19, 2024 13:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, YouTube
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, YouTube
Country: Hong Kong
click to apply

- Ability to understand the desired outcome of a project and bring it to life.
- Creative mind and storytelling skills.
- Attention to detail and ability to work methodically.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work within a team.
- Knowledge of YouTube's platform, algorithms, and best practices for video optimization is a plus.
- Fast turnaround time, for video less than 10 mins, preferably within 2 days.

The budget is for per video.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 19, 2024 13:25 UTC

item.title: Video Editor For Football/Soccer -NEED 1min SAMPLE FIRST - Upwork
item.description:
I need a video editor who's obsessed with soccer/football – someone who can make raw footage sizzle with highlights, killer transitions, and a vibe that gets fans pumped. Got some awesome soccer edits in your portfolio? That's step one.

Next, I need a FREE SAMPLE ( about 1 min - 2 min MAX )  edit using the voice-over I've ATTACHED – show me you can bring it together and make something that'll go viral. you can adjust speed tone, etc, anything, as long the video is amazing.  MAKE SURE and TRY TO

•  try to to actually show clips of videos of what the VoiceOver saying.
•  have multiples changes in sound effects and background music, so the viewer's brain remains  engaged


In the future, I will provide you with the voiceover/script,  your only job is to turn it into an amazing and engaging video.

I am looking forward to hearing from you.

Sample voiceover is here too:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ofBbAU2g2hHd9oJo7PcUEPDti35BsDc6/view?usp=drive_link

SCHEDULE:

Submit Your Sample by Saturday, June 21, 5 pm EST. We will review and have our decision by Monday, June 24, 2024

When you get selected, we will get on a call and discuss the Payment rate for an 8  - 12 min video

Here are some examples of videos we are  trying to model:

https://youtu.be/KRG8FvLNIVI?si=-tTVMSwSWnv5kl7L


https://youtu.be/LfuVapwVn28?si=L9EHF4VwcpL4PxAZ

https://youtu.be/JC1Ljb5InnM?si=Gh-UAruzmXemdIwI

item.title: Video Animator Needed for Short Interface Component Animation - Upwork
item.description:
Take a few seconds to check out our side to get a feel for our company: https://loops.so

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented video animator to create a short animated video (5-15 seconds) showcasing our new “Lists” feature. This video will be used to announce new features on social media. The animation should include UI elements and transitions to a preference center, adhering to the provided style references.

Requirements:

• Deliverable: MP4
• Duration: 5-15 seconds
• Deadline: July 1
• Style: Pseudo-realistic, using UI elements

Check out the style references and animation ideas in the project brief.
